context_of_use: This use case allows power users to perform bulk actions and batch processing to enhance their efficiency.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Improve efficiency in handling tasks
description: Enables power users to efficiently manage bulk operations through specialized tools.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to handle bulk operations.
preconditions: Power user is authenticated and logged into the system.
postconditions: Bulk operations are successfully processed and completed.
assumptions: The system provides necessary tools for bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to handle bulk operations efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on specific bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. Power user initiates a request to manage bulk operations → System displays bulk operations tools.
2. Power user selects the desired bulk operation → System prepares the selected operation.
3. Power user confirms the operation details → System processes the bulk operation.
4. System completes the operation and provides feedback to the power user → Power user receives confirmation of successful operation.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the operation details are invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts the power user to correct the details.
